content: That's a great point about experimenting with other posting times to reach a different audience. I've also noticed that when I post during peak hours, my engagement is higher, but I want to make sure I'm not missing out on other opportunities. I'll definitely try to mix it up and see what works best for my content. By the way, I've been thinking about hosting a social media challenge or giveaway using a branded hashtag to encourage more engagement and attract new followers. Do you think that's a good idea, and do you have any tips on how to execute it successfully?
